games.title: Mumbai Gullies
games.description:
For IGDC 2023 Showcase, Designed the Level Area, Objectives, Dialogue Script and demo game flow.
For Rest of the game: I designed Player Housing, Garage System, Simple Wanted System, Player Mastery System, Vehicle Camera and Damage System, Auto Rickshaw Travel System, Game World Map, and defined NPC behaviors for Mumbai Gullies [MG]. I also created detailed system documents and designed missions, integrating gameplay elements, and coordinating with various teams.

About the Game Mumbai Gullies immerses you in the dynamic contrasts of Mumbai, from towering skyscrapers to sprawling slums. Explore three distinct eras through an action-packed storyline in an expansive open world. This third-person adventure lets you drive, interact, shop, and trade on the bustling stock exchange. Follow a resilient protagonist who rises from sacrifice to power, dominating the local gullies and seizing control of the city. Encounter diverse criminals and power players, shaping your destiny in the heart of Mumbai.

games.title: Temple of Causality
games.description:
I led the creation of the game concept and developed all the levels within the Unity engine. Moreover, I designed the puzzles and challenges to enrich the player's experience. Alongside, I formulated detailed design documents outlining the game mechanics, ensuring a seamless integration of gameplay elements. With a focus on user enjoyment and performance optimization. I parallelly coordinated with the Art and Development Team and managed breakdown of the tasks. Overall, I played a big role in making Temple of Causality.

About Game: Temple of Causality, a Sokoban-style puzzle game on Steam, presents a unique twist: pushing one block triggers a chain reaction, symbolizing the interconnectedness of actions. Set within the enigmatic temple, players navigate through its chambers, uncovering ancient secrets and spiritual undertones. With captivating visuals and immersive soundscapes, the game offers an experience that delves into themes of spirituality and introspection, challenging players to explore the depths of their own understanding.

games.title: Style Diaries
games.description:
• Designed the Dresses Catalog System including item tagging and rating system, drawing insights from competitor games like Covet Fashion and Super Stylist.
  • Collaborated with a 2D Artist to create catalog content.
  • Designed various features such as OOTD Fashion Battles and Multiplayer Voting System.
  • Designed Nail Styling Mini-Game and Eye Makeup Minigame by analyzing Super Stylist.
  • Developed the Tutorial and First Time User Experience in partnership with a UX Designer.
  • Designed Daily Tasks, Reward System, and Player Progression under the guidance of Angelo Lobo (X-Director, Zynga).
  • Created the Story and Choices System by studying similar games such as Kim Kardashian: Hollywood and Britney Spears: American Dream.
  • Authored the Game Design Document (GDD) & designed flow for integrating Mini-games.
  • Enhanced existing game mechanics with the UI/UX Designer for a Meme Game, Food Cooking Game, Selfie Game, and Travel Game (not integrated into the final product).

About Game: Style Diaries is a super stylist social media fashion role-playing dress-up game that gives you the power to become the most influential influencer in the world.
Note: This Game was cancelled.

games.title: Hypercasual Projects
games.description:
I have developed a diverse portfolio of hypercasual games that showcase my creativity, design skills, These games were created for CPI testing and were not released commercially.
  • Idle Demolition Hero (Idle Arcade): Destroy multiple objects & upgrade tools.
  • Idle Spa Store (Idle Arcade): Manage & Grow a spa, offering a soothing experience.
  • Attack the Monsters (Action): Defeat monsters by spawning multiple types of troops.
  • Student Simulator (Simulator): A crazy school life simulation, ex. Fight in school cafeteria.
  • Tile Escape (Puzzle): Spawn tiles in correct places (while avoiding enemies) to reach home.
What I've Learned:
  • Game Mechanics: Designing engaging game mechanics.
  • UI/UX Design: Creating intuitive & user-friendly interfaces.
  • Level Design: Developing varied and challenging levels.
  • Project Management: Managing multiple projects parallelly, ensuring timely delivery & quality assurance. All of the projects seen were completed within a span of 2-3 weeks.
  • Feedback Integration: Iterating designs based on senior’s & publisher’s feedback.

games.title: Rebound
games.description:
• Designed the entire game concept.
  • Created and implemented game levels in Unity.
  • Regularly coordinated with the developer to monitor progress and make necessary changes.

Embark on a journey with a ball as it navigates through the mysterious Ancient Ruins. Guide it to the final destination, collecting orbs and uncovering temple secrets. Overcome puzzles and intense challenges, using techniques like bouncing off walls and teleporting through portals, while avoiding explosions. Checkpoints are strategically placed to keep your progress smooth. Your mission? Reach the finish line—and that's just the start!
